title: Art + Mid Doors Full Utility Hold
description: Here's a full utility setup that allows you to primarily hold Art, while leaving utility at Mid Doors to let your team know if enemies push through Doors.

title: Full Utility C Site Execute + Post Plant Site Hold
description: This is a straightforward, and very effective full utility C Site Execute + post plant Site hold. Only place the Turret after your team has taken a considerable amount of control of C Main.

title: Aggressive Early Round C Main Turret + Full Utility Post Plant
description: Use this turret early in the round to attempt to take space in C Main, if your team successfully takes control of C, then use the rest of this setup in the post plant.

title: B Main Lurk Turret Setup when Team is Pushing A
description: Use this Turret when your team is pushing toward A, if you want to lurk into B Main.

title: Early Round A Main Turret + Full Utility A and B Setup
description: Place this Turret in A Main at the start of the round to spot the Attackers if they peek into A Main from A Lobby.

title: Quick C Long To Right Side C Site Guiding Light
description: This is useful for supporting your teammates as they push into C Site from Garage and C Long, since you can either flash players in some of the commonly held angles on the close right side of C Site, or gather information on whether or not players are/aren't holding angles from those positions.

title: Safe A Garden To Mid Courtyard
description: This lineup allows you to gather information on Mid Courtyard and potentially inside of B Site safely, without the worry of being wallbanged by players in B Site through the right Mid Window Wall.

title: Grass Support/Info Flash Into Garage
description: This is primarily useful for gathering information on the inside of Garage, or supporting your teammates push inside. Make sure your team has control of Grass, and that players can't easily lurk into Mid Courtyard and pick you off that way.

title: A Link To Front B Site Guiding Light
description: This is primarily useful for breaking up the Attacker's push into B Site, gathering information on the front side of B Site, and supporting your teammates as they retake control of the Site.

title: A Ramps Info / Aggressive Trailblazer from A Lobby
description: Here's a simple, but effective Trailblazer that can be used to clear out A Ramps either to gather information on Ramps, or assist your team in pushing up Ramps. This is typically used toward the beginning of the round, but can be used at later stages of the round.

title: Default B Rafters Guiding Light
description: Here are two different ways to use your flash from B Rafters, one to contest B Heaven and the other to support your teammates.

title: Start Round Info A Main From A Rafters
description: At the start of the round, throw your flash as shown in the video, for fast information towards A Main.

title: Standard B Main Guiding Light
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to Defend B Main. This is a good way to apply pressure B Main even if you do not flash, as Attackers will be wary of it.

title: Early Round B Tower / B Main Trailblazers for Mid / B Lobby
description: These two Trailblazers are great for gathering information on enemy players in Mid, Ramen, and B Lobby. As the Defending half progresses, you should get a feel for which one to use based on how the Attackers play in this general area of the map.

title: Mid Vent Information Flash from A Tower
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to gather information on whether or not enemy players are pushing through Mid Vent. Just make sure that you are aware of the timing of enemy players pushing through that area of the map so that you don't get picked off by a player closer than you had previously thought.

title: Early Round A Ramp Trailblazer for A Lobby
description: Here's a great way to gather information on A Main and A Lobby toward the beginning of the round from A Ramps. If you spot a high mobility Duelist getting ready to push up Ramps, immediately leave the view of the trailblazer and either back up or fight the Duelist.

title: How to Split A Site With Trailblazer at Tree
description: Follow this Trailblazer pathing to prevent Defenders playing Tree from disrupting your A Site split.

title: B Site Guiding Light Set Flashes
description: Combo your utility to prevent Defenders from obtaining free picks towards B Main with these execute flashes.

title: Guiding Light To Open Up Mid Courtyard Push Into Mid Bottom
description: This is useful for flashing players holding many of the commonly held angles on the Defender side of Mid, if you have the full support of your team.

title: Pizza/Outer Mid Market Guiding Light To Defender Spawn
description: This is useful for flashing players holding most of the commonly held angles on the Defender Side of Mid, as well as in and around the Defender Side Spawn. Be sure to do this with the help of your team and not over commit though, since this is counter-able by the Defenders if done carelessly.

title: B Main Entrance Into B Site Trailblazer
description: This is useful for checking for utility and players inside or close outside of B Main on B Site.

title: Guiding Light For A Rafters/A Site From A Main
description: This is mainly useful for flashing a player on rafters from an unexpected angle, but is also useful for getting information on A Site, depending on how far you guide the guiding light above the wall dividing A Site and A Main.

title: Guiding Light Cat Peek From Tree
description: Here's a universally strong flash lineup you can use for info on Attackers at Mid, or to set up a play. You can set for a solo play, or coordinate one with your teammates at Bottom Mid.

title: B Main Peek With Guiding Light
description: Use this flash lineup to peek B Main effectively, you can also use this to support teammates from sitting directly under the window as well.

title: Guiding Light To Retake A Site From A Rafters
description: This is useful for both flashing players on A Site, and getting information on players on A Site. This can be useful whether you flash someone or not, because you are either forcing enemy players to not peek, or you are getting information on players and potentially creating an opening to get a pick on Site.

title: B Site To Mid Bottom Guiding Light To Flash Most Of Mid
description: This is useful for assisting your teammates in Mid Cubby, A Tree, Mid Market, and Mid Bottom if they are being pushed by the Attackers anywhere in Mid.

title: A Site To A Lobby Trailblazer
description: This is useful for checking for utility and players in A Lobby and A Main.

title: B Site To B Lobby Entrance Into B Main Trailblazer
description: This is useful for checking for utility and players around the entrance into B Main From B Lobby, and for looking for information on as much of B Lobby as you're able to without the enemy shooting your trailblazer.

title: Trailblazer To Retake B Site From Defender Side Spawn
description: This is useful for scouting out the location of players in both outer and inner B Site when retaking the Site, and if you manage to stun someone that could be very beneficial to your and your team as you push into site.

title: Post Plant Yellow Guiding Light
description: Here's a simple, but effective pop flash lineup you can use to disrupt Defenders trying to retake the site.

title: Mid Blue to Mid Boiler Guiding Light
description: This is a good guiding light to blind enemies playing Mid Boiler and allow you to peak or go under B Tube and take B Site.

title: A Rafter to Defender Spawn Guiding Light
description: This is a good guiding light to blind and swing on rotators that are rotating to A Site.

title: A Pipes to A Pipes Corner Trailblazer
description: This is a good trailblazer to concuss your enemies hiding in the corner of A Pipes towards A Site.

title: How to Support at Mid With Trailblazer From Pallet
description: Follow this simple, but effective Trailblazer pathing to set up your teammates to have an advantageous fight at Mid. Make sure to match the timing with their peek, as Attackers will look to shoot your utility.

title: Early Round Guiding Light to Belt For Info
description: Here's a great start round info flash you can use, it will spot any Attacker at the A side part of the map.

title: Window to B Tube Guiding Light
description: This is a good guiding light to blind enemies peaking from under B Tube and allow you to swing and get a kill.

title: B Tube to Mid Blue Guiding Light
description: This is a good guiding light to blind enemies peaking Mid Boiler or under B Tube from Mid Blue. Swinging off your flash will guarantee you a kill if you blind them.
